stories.title: Show HN: Detect Russian visitors to block them and protest the war in Ukraine
Snowboarding for Geeks: An Ultimate Guide
MIT abandons Russian high-tech campus partnership in light of Ukraine invasion
Ukrainian tech companies hope for the best, plan for worst

stories.text:
This post was on the front page a few days and really resonated with me [1]. I love HN, because there is nowhere else on the internet with the same concentration of intelligence, deep knowledge and mature perspective on things.

However like the author Iâ€™ve noticed myself becoming increasingly cynical about tech, and the world. This is a very bad attitude to have for any startup ambitions, where optimism (bordering on irrationality) is necessary to succeed. So I want to start reading other things more often.

What other communities are there that are more optimistic, but still have a similar level of intelligence, experience etc?

1. https://kg.dev/thoughts/i-love-you-hn-but-youre-toxic
stories.title: Ask HN: Similar communities to HN that are less cynical?
Facebook Allows Praise of Neo-Nazi Ukrainian Battalion If It Fights Russian
